column2: Discard reads below minimum quality threshold
Check of bacterial contamination; discard offending reads
Discard reads with common uncalled characters (e.g. N)
Remove reads from pair-end libraries that were orphaned by filtering steps 1-3
Calculated for each library from BAM files obtained by mapping a random sample (one million reads) of each FASTQ file against transcriptome reference (Ensembl Plants release: 17)
Against genome reference (Ensembl Plants release: 17) tophat1 version:  1.4.1
